item.description:
Come join us for a free class as an introduction to our 8-week course, Philosophy from Plato to Buddha.

We study the major Eastern and Western philosophical traditions in a comparative approach and extract pratical tools for living better today.

You are welcome to attend one class for free to decide if this course is of interest to you. The class this week will be on Karma, Dharma and the Gita.

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: The Bhagavad Gita and the Wisdom of Ancient India
